counter.name: SlowCount
counter.summary: The number of times the consumer was detected as rate limiting consumer by the producer.

counter.name: PublishedCount
counter.summary: The number of times the link has consumed and published a fragment.

counter.name: PublishedSizeBytes
counter.summary: The total number of bytes read by the link consumer.

counter.name: FilteredCount
counter.summary: The number of consumed fragments that were filtered.

counter.name: FilteredSizeBytes
counter.summary: The total number of bytes read by the link consumer that were filtered.

counter.name: OverrunPollingCount
counter.summary: The number of times the link has been overrun while polling.

counter.name: OverrunReadingCount
counter.summary: The number of input overruns detected while reading metadata by the consumer.

gauge.name: Pid
gauge.summary: The process ID of the tile.

gauge.name: InBackpressure
gauge.summary: Whether the tile is currently backpressured or not, either 1 or 0.

counter.name: BackpressureCount
counter.summary: Number of times the times the tile has had to wait for one of more consumers to catch up to resume publishing.

histogram.name: LoopHousekeepingDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which did housekeeping. The various loop durations are mutually exclusive and exhaustive, so the sum of time across all of them is roughly the total running time of the tile. Loop durations are per iteration of the run loop and non-blocking, so for example each 'caught up' sample does not represent the time we waited for new input data, but rather how long each iteration of the spin loop waiting for the data took.

histogram.name: LoopBackpressureDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which terminated because we were backpressured by a consumer.

histogram.name: LoopCaughtUpDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which terminated because there was no new data to process.

histogram.name: LoopOverrunPollingDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which terminated because we were overrun while polling.

histogram.name: LoopOverrunReadingDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which terminated because we were overrun while reading.

histogram.name: LoopFilterBeforeFragmentDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which terminated because we filtered the fragment before reading it.

histogram.name: LoopFilterAfterFragmentDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which terminated because we filtered the fragment after reading it.

histogram.name: LoopFinishDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of one iteration of the run loop which received, did not filter, and processed the fragment.

histogram.name: FragmentFilteredSizeBytes
histogram.summary: Size of each fragment that was filtered and not processed by the tile.

histogram.name: FragmentHandledSizeBytes
histogram.summary: Size of each fragment that was processed (not filtered) by the tile.

counter.name: NonQuicReassemblyAppend
counter.summary: Result of fragment reassembly for a non-QUIC UDP transaction.

counter.name: NonQuicReassemblyPublish
counter.summary: Result of publishing reassmbled fragment for a non-QUIC UDP transaction.

counter.name: ReassemblyAppend
counter.summary: Result of fragment reassembly for a QUIC transaction.

counter.name: ReassemblyPublish
counter.summary: Result of publishing reassmbled fragment for a QUIC transaction.

counter.name: ReassemblyNotifyClobbered
counter.summary: Reassembly slot was clobbered before it was notified.

counter.name: CryptoMallocFailure
counter.summary: Number of tiles crypto_malloc failed to allocate bytes for OpenSSL.

counter.name: QuicPacketTooSmall
counter.summary: Count of packets received on the QUIC port that were too small to be a valid IP packet.

counter.name: NonQuicPacketTooSmall
counter.summary: Count of packets received on the non-QUIC port that were too small to be a valid IP packet.

counter.name: NonQuicPacketTooLarge
counter.summary: Count of packets received on the non-QUIC port that were too large to be a valid transaction.

counter.name: ReceivedPackets
counter.summary: Number of IP packets received.

counter.name: ReceivedBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes received (including IP, UDP, QUIC headers).

counter.name: SentPackets
counter.summary: Number of IP packets sent.

counter.name: SentBytes
counter.summary: Total bytes sent (including IP, UDP, QUIC headers).

gauge.name: ConnectionsActive
gauge.summary: The number of currently active QUIC connections.

counter.name: ConnectionsCreated
counter.summary: The total number of connections that have been created.

counter.name: ConnectionsClosed
counter.summary: Number of connections gracefully closed.

counter.name: ConnectionsAborted
counter.summary: Number of connections aborted.

counter.name: ConnectionsRetried
counter.summary: Number of connections established with retry.

counter.name: ConnectionErrorNoSlots
counter.summary: Number of connections that failed to create due to lack of slots.

counter.name: ConnectionErrorTlsFail
counter.summary: Number of connections that aborted due to TLS failure.

counter.name: ConnectionErrorRetryFail
counter.summary: Number of connections that failed during retry (e.g. invalid token).

counter.name: HandshakesCreated
counter.summary: Number of handshake flows created.

counter.name: HandshakeErrorAllocFail
counter.summary: Number of handshakes dropped due to alloc fail.

counter.name: StreamOpened
counter.summary: Number of streams opened.

counter.name: StreamClosed
counter.summary: Number of streams closed.

counter.name: StreamReceivedEvents
counter.summary: Number of stream RX events.

counter.name: StreamReceivedBytes
counter.summary: Total stream payload bytes received.

histogram.name: InsertTransactionDurationSeconds
histogram.summary: Duration of inserting one transaction into the pool of available transactions

histogram.name: TotalTransactionsPerMicroblockCount
histogram.summary: Count of transactions in a scheduled microblock, including both votes and non-votes

histogram.name: VotesPerMicroblockCount
histogram.summary: Count of simple vote transactions in a scheduled microblock

counter.name: GossipedVotesReceived
counter.summary: Count of simple vote transactions received over gossip instead of via the normal TPU path

counter.name: NormalTransactionReceived
counter.summary: Count of transactions received via the normal TPU path

counter.name: TransactionInserted
counter.summary: Result of inserting a transaction into the pack object

gauge.name: AvailableTransactions
gauge.summary: The total number of pending transactions in pack's pool that are available to be scheduled

gauge.name: AvailableVoteTransactions
gauge.summary: The number of pending simple vote transactions in pack's pool that are available to be scheduled

gauge.name: PendingTransactionsHeapSize
gauge.summary: The maximum number of pending transactions that pack can consider. This value is fixed at Firedancer startup but is a useful reference for AvailableTransactions and AvailableVoteTransactions.

counter.name: MicroblockPerBlockLimit
counter.summary: The number of times pack did not pack a microblock because the limit on microblocks/block had been reached

counter.name: TransactionSkipped
counter.summary: The number of times pack considered a transaction but skipped it due to account conflicts

counter.name: DeleteMissed
counter.summary: Count of attempts to delete a transaction that wasn't found

counter.name: DeleteHit
counter.summary: Count of attempts to delete a transaction that was found and deleted
